posts.post_content:
Posted By: Donald Johnson
Offering four very rare 1885-6 Brooklyn Scorecards vs the teams list below (some are possibly unique):

Cassidy vs. Mets 28 July 1885 SOLD
Geo Smith vs. Pittsburg 12 Sep 1885 SOLD
Wm Phillips vs. Baltimore 30 Apr 1885 SOLD
Geo Pickney vs. Cinn 27 May 1886 (McPhee & Mullane listed) SOLD

The scorecards are all neatly filled out and also have the dates and times of the games played as well as the overseeing umpires!  Two of the four scorecards are add-backs, two are blank.

Please email to reserve and to obtain larger sized scans.  Thanks for looking!


[IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1167528230.JPG[/IMG] [IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1167528244.JPG[/IMG] [IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1167585581.JPG[/IMG] [IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1167585596.JPG[/IMG]

Posted By: Bryan Long
May I have a larger scan of the Geo smith scorecard please?
